Chapter 5

Exercise 1

import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from scipy.stats import norm

d_prime_1 = .8


p_hits = [.1, .3, .5, .7, .8]
Z_SN = [norm.ppf(1.0-p) for p in p_hits]


Z_N_1 = [norm.cdf(d_prime_1 + z) for z in Z_SN]
p_false_alarms_1 = [1.0 - z for z in Z_N_1]

d_prime_2 = 1.6
Z_N_2 = [norm.cdf(d_prime_2 + z) for z in Z_SN]
p_false_alarms_2 = [1.0 - z for z in Z_N_2]

df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "d' = 0.8": p_false_alarms_1,
        "d' = 1.6": p_false_alarms_2,
        "Hit Rate": p_hits
    }
)
px.line(df, x=["d' = 0.8", "d' = 1.6"], y="Hit Rate")

Exercise 2

df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "Observer": [1,2,3,4,5],
        "False Alarm Rate": [.18, .38, .42, .30, .70],
        "Hit Rate": [.84, .96, .69, .48, .98]
    }
)

answer = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "Observer": [1,2,3,4,5],
        "d'": [1.91, 2.06, .70, .47, 1.53],
        "β": [.935, .226, .900, 1.144, .141]
    }
)
answer
Observer d' β
0 1 1.91 0.935
1 2 2.06 0.226
2 3 0.70 0.900
3 4 0.47 1.144
4 5 1.53 0.141

Exercise 3

p_S = .30

β_opt = .70/.30 * (2 - -1) / (2 - -1)
β_opt

p_S = .70

β_opt = .30/.70 * (2 - -1) / (2 - -1)
β_opt
0.4285714285714286

Exercise 4

P_opt = .5/.5 * (1 - -.5) / (2 - -1.5)
P_opt
0.42857142857142855
